text: Jaak Boon (born 1948, Brussels) is a Belgian television writer, director and producer who specializes in the production of comedy. Mainly a writer for Belgian television, Boon has written for a number of popular mainstream comedies in Belgium such as De Kotmadam since 1991 working with director Ronnie Commissaris. Boon co-wrote the series with Frans Ceusters. ==External links== * Category:Flemish television writers Category:Male television writers Category:People from Brussels Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:Belgian male writers
title: Jaak Boon
